64817.summary: Some customers in the Horse Hill area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
64817.title: July 29 - Edmonton (Horse Hill) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
